General.Name: Expleo Solutions Limited
General.Description: Expleo Solutions Limited, together with its subsidiaries, primarily provides software validation and verification services to the banking, financial services, and insurance industries worldwide. It offers computer programming, consultancy and related activities, quality management, software development, software testing, software development, digital transformation, product and process engineering, quality and testing, and customer support and maintenance services. The company was formerly known as SQS India BFSI Limited and changed its name to Expleo Solutions Limited in April 2019. Expleo Solutions Limited was incorporated in 1998 and is based in Chennai, India. Expleo Solutions Limited Limited is a subsidiary of Expleo Technology Germany GmbH.
